name: Rxcovery
summary: Battle your way through a nightmare hospital to get enough money to pay your bill!

name: RXN: Raijin
summary: RXN: Raijin is a sci-fi vertically scrolling shoot ’em up game.

name: RXE
summary: RXE is a game about building and programming robots. Design machines using a variety of parts and devices, and write code in a powerful visual programming language.

name: RXC
summary: Battle the world in reckless races as you bash, slide, and jump your way to the checkered flag. This isn't just another top-down arcade racing game. RXC is a physics heavy racing game with a traction and handling model that challenges even die-hard sim racers while still being fun for newcomers.

name: RX squad
summary: The earth is suffering from an attack of space monsters, and the terran defense forces are called for combat and the annihilation of the monsters. The RX Squad with their advanced ships risks themselves to keep the earth in peace.

name: RXN: Raijin
summary: Japanese game developer and shoot-'em-up specialists Gulti and Kayac are proud to present the all-new RXN -Raijin-.

name: RX10-40
summary: 『RX10-40』(RX ten forty) is a third-person shooter. Ricocheting Bullets, Shields, and Baton stun guns. An antithesis to an ever-accelerating world.
